rows.label: tlk70000045_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Did friends not mention Rikoko was
Nopon? Rikoko hear Azzarn was not
happy about that.

rows.label: tlk70000045_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Meh! Rikoko is lady and perfectly
capable one too, so why Azzarn care?

rows.label: tlk70000045_05_msg0003
rows.name:
But Rikoko make beautiful sound
huffing and puffing on flute. Even
Azzarn appreciate that.

rows.label: tlk70000045_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Azzarn has closed mind, but very
serious about music and technique.
Good partner for Rikoko.

rows.label: tlk70000045_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Rikoko will study hard and become
great minstrel one day! Show Azzarn
what Rikoko is made of!
